page.title: 20THE WRITERS.
page.content: We were in Class 2 in 1985. We chose the things and places we thought would interest children our age, 10, in the future.We all put our ideas together and then put them onto the computer. We could not get all our names on this page so we decided to put the names of those who had done the typing. Kay Maddison,J.Ablewhite,Jane Moore, R.Flanagan,Julia Doughty,Beth Hiblin, S.Eaton,Poppy Musson,R.Muggridge, Katherine Johnson,Victoria Lloyd, D.Cockerill,N.Stevenson,D.Gardner, Elizabeth Johnson and R.Collet.
